# Age Resistance (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 4]], [[6th Level Druid Spells|Druid 6]], [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Witch Spells|Witch 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 11]], [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Components:** V, S

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 24 hours

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 205

This spell functions as *[[Age Resistance, Lesser (Spell)|lesser age resistance]]*, except you ignore the Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution penalties gained at middle age and old age.
